forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the dusk embraces Downtown San Francisco, the vibrant hum of the city hums softly against a backdrop of mostly clear skies. The temperature hovers comfortably around fifty degrees, buoyed by a gentle southwest breeze, weaving through the streets like whispers of conversation in a café. Tonight, the air is fresh—a little crisp, urging you to wrap up in something cozy if you venture outside, perhaps a light jacket to ward off the evening chill.

Awakening to a promising Saturday, the sun will rise bright and cheerful, nudging high near sixty-four, momentarily casting long shadows that dance upon the pavement before the afternoon coolness nudges temperatures down to around sixty-one. Though the city may not be enveloped in fog, hints of the marine layer linger nearby, playful wisps that entice adventure within the charm of San Francisco’s hills. Spending the day in layers, you might stroll along the waterfront, or perhaps find yourself nestled in a local bookstore, cradling a warm cup of coffee. Whatever you choose, let the subtlety of the day guide your steps through the familiar streets, discovering moments in the mundane that flutter like petals in the wind.
